projects.projectDescription: This a full Stack ecommerce website, In this version im using node.js as the backend and mySQL as the database where products are stored.
This is a refactor of the Power Lab ecommerce website changing the websites database from mySQL to MongoDB Atlas cloud. This project adds in login and logout authenication

This project turns the Power Lab parts ecommerce website into a PWA, This includes registering a service worker and adding cache. Functionality such as login, logout and the ADMIN page are still available. Visit this page on mobile to download the app.

LifeSport is a organization that specializes in helping youth through sports and education. The exercise app helps create exercises with a description, duration and a coach. Once you create a username, it will always be saved in the system. You then are able to create, edit, or delete the exercise.
